attributes.action: not force people to sell their homes to pay for residential care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why work hard and save all your life to buy a house (or have savings) to then find it has to be sold to pay for residential care when diagnosed with dementia or other non-hospitalisation treatment, especially when those who don't save, have their fees paid by the authorities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
